name: pb-workflows
description: Pixelbyte plugin collection for Figma-to-code, frontend development, and code review workflows. Install individual plugins based on your needs.

plugins.name: pb-figma
plugins.description: Figma-to-code conversion with pixel-perfect accuracy. Includes Pixelbyte Figma MCP Server for design token extraction and 5-phase workflow with visual validation.

plugins.name: pb-frontend
plugins.description: Senior-level frontend development guidelines for React/TypeScript. Covers Suspense, SWR, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, Next.js App Router, performance, and accessibility.

plugins.name: pb-code-review
plugins.description: Prompt compliance checker agent for validating implementations against requirements. Detects regressions and ensures code matches the original prompt.
